name: UN-STABLE (Blit Blat Games)
description:
UN-STABLE - A HORSEY ADVENTURE

Created for Godot Wild Jam #49 - "UNSTABLE"

Avoid fences by jumping with mouse/keyboard. How much of the world will the horse see?
